title: Empire Falls
creator_credit: William Teitler, Richard Russo, Stuart Wurtzel, Donna Zakowska, Fred Schepisi, Aspetuck Productions, HBO Films and Marc Platt Productions
brief_description: The humorous, poignant story of a declining New England town and its inhabitants, whose lives are deeply rooted in and influenced by the Knox River and its vacant mills, their class differences, and ghosts of the past.

constellations_other.name: Fred Schepisi
constellations_other.description: Fred Schepisi's diverse body of work connects to acclaimed local productions, westerns and Hollywood favourites.

creator_credit_for_label: William Teitler, Richard Russo, Stuart Wurtzel, Donna Zakowska, Fred Schepisi, Aspetuck Productions, HBO Films and Marc Platt Productions
